p.s: I hope you are doing fine and did not encounter any major problems.

I found an article and wanted to ask if you've ever had to deal with something like that.
The article states that black people are being strongly discriminated and that the chances of them having to go to jail are way higher than whites having to sit in prison.
They think it is because of something called stop-and-frisk that officers seem to do a lot more often with blacks than whites.
Another point which was shocking was that after the congress and the Civil Rights Act establishment blacks still seem to live under social and economical discrimination.
The article states that it starts in the educational system, that only few get theretheir school qualifications but even these still not get hired.
As an effect one quarter of the black people live in poverty where aswhereas under ten Prozent of the whites have to live in poverty.
I sincerely hope that you do not and did not have to deal with that.
And because I know that you go to a schol where almost equally black and whites attend, I hope you are treated without a difference.
